entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of snow early this afternoon. Snow mixed with rain beginning this afternoon. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow mixed with rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Snow mixed with rain early this evening. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 19 February 2023
